name: European Conservation Agriculture Federation
goal: ECAF promotes among Europe's farmers the soil management "best practice" aspects of Conservation Agriculture. With member associations in Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Moldova, Portugal, Russia, Slovakia, Spain Switzerland and Turkey, ECAF represents the interests of the majority of the European Union's cropped farmland.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment
euInitiatives:
Common Agricultural Policy
Agri-environemtal schemes
Soil Directive
Environment Policies
Agricultural Climate change policies
